name: Knee Support
descr: The knee is particularly susceptible to wear and tear. Many people complain of pain that could be a sign of developing arthrosis. This joint damage is often the result of years of overuse and incorrect strain at work and at home. Working frequently in a kneeling position also results in pain. The Chiroform Knee Support helps with acute and chronic joint pain and is also recommended as a preventative measure for all knee-straining activities at work, at home and leisure. Suitable for all-day and long-term use. Highly elastic wave knit. Light compression of 20-25 mmHG. Hand washing recommended. Can be used for right and left knee.
